job_tasks.phrase: funger als senior door zowel zelf te coderen als het team te coachen op technische aspecten.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core software engineering task of coding and also coaching the team on technical aspects, aligning with traditional software development responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: De focus ligt op het ontwikkelen van end-to-end webapplicaties met behulp van Python en Django.
job_tasks.justification: This directly refers to the development of web applications, a fundamental software engineering task.

job_tasks.phrase: Het schrijven van efficiënte, onderhoudsvriendelijke en schaalbare code voor verschillende applicaties van het platform behoren tot je takenpakket;
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation of code with specific quality attributes (efficiency, maintainability, scalability), which are core to software development.

job_tasks.phrase: werk je nauw samen met data scientist en data engineers om LLM's te integreren zodat het platform optimaal functioneert en presteert;
job_tasks.justification: This involves integrating LLMs into a platform, which is a key aspect of integrating AI/ML features into software applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bent op de hoogte van de nieuwste ontwikkelingen op het gebied van GenAI, LLM en softwareontwikkeling zodat je instaat bent om met nieuwe inzichten en aanbevelingen te komen ter optimalisatie van onze producten;
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the need to understand new developments and provide recommendations for product optimization, which relates to understanding the business context and strategic alignment.

job_tasks.phrase: begeleid je junior developers, deel je jouw kennis en ervaring en lever je een bijdrage aan het creëren van een innovatieve werkomgeving;
job_tasks.justification: This describes mentoring junior developers and sharing knowledge, which falls under communication and collaboration.

job_tasks.phrase: uitvoeren van code-reviews, het geven van constructieve feedback om onze 'coding standards' en 'best practices' te blijven hanteren;
job_tasks.justification: Code reviews and ensuring adherence to standards are integral parts of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Werk je nauw samen met je stakeholders om de behoeftes te begrijpen, technische oplossingen te adviseren en hoogwaardige softwareproducten op tijd en binnen het budget te leveren.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights understanding stakeholder needs, advising on technical solutions, and delivering products within constraints, which relates to business understanding and strategic delivery.

soft_skills.justification: Understanding stakeholder needs, advising on solutions, and delivering within constraints are core aspects of business understanding and strategic delivery.

profile.rationale: The job ad heavily emphasizes traditional software development tasks (coding, web application development, code reviews, scalability, Python, Django) which fall under Macro-Category A. While it mentions integrating LLMs and staying updated on GenAI/LLM developments (Macro-Category B), the core focus remains on building and maintaining the platform where these integrations happen. The role is described as a 'Senior Full-stack Developer' with a significant contribution to a platform for using and developing AI applications, rather than a role focused purely on model development or GenAI specialization. Therefore, it aligns best with an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines a strong emphasis on software development practices and technologies, while also indicating the integration of GenAI/LLMs. The profile assignment is well-supported by the text, but a slightly lower score is given because the 'AI-Adjacent' aspect is inferred from the balance of tasks rather than explicitly stated as the primary focus over pure software engineering.
